author: twl
msg: Javadoc fixes for HTML DOM and Serializers package

author: sandygao
msg: Add the namespace uri to the symbol table.
This wasn't done for namespaces from the xsi:schemaLocation attribute

author: sandygao
msg: Provide more accurate error message in the case where the base type of
a simple type can not be found.

author: sandygao
msg: Fixing bug [2703]: change network path "\\host\blah" to "file://host/blah", so that we can find other file paths relative to this one.

author: sandygao
msg: If an child-element is not expected, an error should be reported against
the parent element (an error code in the PSVI item of the parent element).
